meanings.definition: (verb) spread to other parts of the body
meanings.sent1: The cancer cells metastasized from the lungs to the liver.
meanings.sent2: The disease metastasized quickly, causing complications.
meanings.sent3: The rumor about the party spread like metastasized cancer cells.
meanings.sent4: His influence metastasized throughout the organization, affecting every department.
meanings.sent5: The invasive species metastasized, taking over the entire ecosystem.

meanings.definition: (adjective) having spread to other parts of the body
meanings.sent1: The metastasized tumor required immediate attention.
meanings.sent2: Her condition was critical due to the metastasized cancer.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations looked like a metastasized mess.
meanings.sent4: The issue had a metastasized impact on the community.
meanings.sent5: The metastasized infection had spread beyond control.
